org.sindice.siren.index.codecs.block

Class BlockIndexInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.index.codecs.block.BlockIndexInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocsFreqBlockIndexInput, NodBlockIndexInput, PosBlockIndexInput

    public abstract class BlockIndexInput
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Abstract API to decode a block-based posting format.

    This class is safe for concurrent file access. This is achieved by cloning the underlying IndexInput in every BlockIndexInput.BlockReader.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  BlockIndexInput.BlockReader
      Abstraction over the reader of the blocks of the postings file.
      class  BlockIndexInput.Index
      This class stores the file pointer of a DataInput.
